projects.title: Aegis
projects.description: Aegis is an ambitious computer vision turret controller that leverages YOLO for real-time object detection and face recognition. Still in development, it promises to set a new standard in automated security solutions.

projects.title: Algoduel
projects.description: Algoduel is a strategic game where you craft an algorithm to control your fighter as they battle against AI opponents. It merges coding challenges with engaging gameplay for a unique competitive experience.
